title: Placement.
body: Went from being in silver all season... to then going into this placement shit for bronze 4. I quit. honestly you guys have just been taking the piss lately and thats the last straw. good luck with your game but you're standards are dropping. bronze 4... thats a pathetic placement cause I know I play at a silver elo minimum, as was proved all of last season. i'm not wasting my time on a game that just punishes players for no reason.

replies.body: the idea of a game is to go up in ranks or masteries etc. not continue to be stuck in the same area having to complete the same goals over n over... waste of time

If you were placed into the rank you were in last season, then you wouldn't have as much space to go up into.

You have an entire year. Enjoy the game.
